title: League Crashing After Champ Select
body: Okay, I have had this problem for about a week or two now. Right after champ select, my league will bugsplat and when I close and reopen it, it says I have corrupted files. It allows me to patch these files up to 14%, when it then starts calculating differences for a bit. After that, it loads right on up to 100% and I can get into the game but usually the team has remade by then. I have tried deleting all the files and then re-downloading the game along with uninstalling it. I also do not have Lolreplay, which many have said was their problem. I can usually play about one game, but if I try to play another it will crash again. So far I've been put into a low priority queue for 5 game for 5 minutes and now I'm in a low priority queue for 5 games for 10 minutes because of this. If anyone has a solution I would greatly appreciate it.

replies.body:
There are a number of things that could be causing this, especially with some recent Windows 10 updates that have been problematic for some players. Without additional context, I'd say your best course of action is to work through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) since it covers some really common solutions for this.

Let me know if this helped.
I think it was the windows 10 update and it seems to be working now. Thanks for the response, I greatly appreciate it.

Hello, are you a Windows 10 user who got a recent W10 Anniversary update? Please have a look at these threads:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gdEazY7E-fps-at-like-2-or-3-recently-all-game-need-help-ever-scince-a-windows-update?comment=0000
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KFxcVtYK-my-computer-is-randomly-freeezing-mid-game?comment=0000
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/il5Qxm2w-if-you-are-still-having-the-bugsplat-bug-after-champ-select-read-this
Thanks, I followed the links and did what they said and it seems to work now. I greatly appreciate it.
